name: zona21
description: Plataforma de ingestão, catalogação e seleção de mídia para foto e vídeo

scripts.build: tsc && vite build && vite build --config vite.main.config.js && vite build --config vite.preload.config.js && electron-builder --config electron-builder.yml
scripts.dev:parallel: concurrently "npm run dev:electron" "npm run dev:renderer" "npm run dev:start"
scripts.electron:build: vite build --config vite.main.config.js && vite build --config vite.preload.config.js && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.yml
scripts.electron:build:win: vite build --config vite.main.config.js && vite build --config vite.preload.config.js && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.yml --win
scripts.electron:build:win:msix: vite build --config vite.main.config.js && vite build --config vite.preload.config.js && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.yml --win
scripts.electron:build:win:nsis: vite build --config vite.main.config.js && vite build --config vite.preload.config.js && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.yml --win
scripts.electron:build:linux: vite build --config vite.main.config.js && vite build --config vite.preload.config.js && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.yml --linux
scripts.electron:publish: vite build --config vite.main.config.js && vite build --config vite.preload.config.js && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.yml --publish always
scripts.electron:publish:win: vite build --config vite.main.config.js && vite build --config vite.preload.config.js && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.yml --win --publish always
scripts.electron:publish:win:nsis: vite build --config vite.main.config.js && vite build --config vite.preload.config.js && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.yml --win --publish always
scripts.electron:build:win:msix-store: vite build --config vite.main.config.js && vite build --config vite.preload.config.js && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.yml --win --x64 --publish never
scripts.electron:publish:linux: vite build --config vite.main.config.js && vite build --config vite.preload.config.js && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.yml --linux --publish always
scripts.electron:publish:mac: vite build --config vite.main.config.js && vite build --config vite.preload.config.js && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.yml --mac --publish always
scripts.electron:publish:mac:all: vite build --config vite.main.config.js && vite build --config vite.preload.config.js && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.yml --mac --arm64 --x64 --publish always

author: Zona21 Team
